thread.title: Hateblogging Trump's first speech to Congress, #1
thread.title_full: Hateblogging Trump's first speech to Congress, #1

author: rss@dailykos.com (Joan McCarter)
title: Hateblogging Trump's first speech to Congress, #1
text:
7 
Popular vote loser Donald Trump will release the beginnings of his budget plan in a joint session of Congress. He's also going to make his vision for Obamacare repeal and replacement clear. He's going to heal the nation by condemning anti-Semitism. Or he'll just give a typical Trump speech about his huge Electoral College victory, his huge inauguration plans, and vague promises of how terrific healthcare is going to be. Probably that, instead. 
Follow along with us here.
